Text.content:
The List element enables you to show automatically generated lists of content elements on a page. In the list configuration, you must set the list type and the source folder for the list elements. If required, you can also set additional filters or search criteria.

Often the a list displays only a short 'teaser' form of the result element. The full content of the result elements in this case is displayed on a Detail page that is accessed through the List. A detail page must be created in the sitemap for each content element type that is used in a List.
